What is the hardware of the Asus Rog Ally? â€‹

DANGER

The Rog Ally X specifications are not covered here because the only change is the color and battery being upgraded from 40WHrs to 80WHrs.

The Asus Rog Ally runs:

  • Operating System: Windows 11 Home

  • Processor: AMD Ryzenâ„¢ Z1 Extreme Processor ("Zen4" architecture with 4nm process, 8-core /16-threads, 24MB total cache, up to 5.10 Ghz boost)

  • GPU: GPU: AMD Radeonâ„¢ Graphics (AMD RDNAâ„¢ 3, 12 CUs, up to 2.7 GHz, up to 8.6 Teraflops) TDP: 9-30W

  • Display: 7-inch FHD (1920 x 1080) 16:9 IPS-level glossy display sRGB: 100% Adobe: 75.35% GorillaÂ® Glass Victusâ„¢ GorillaÂ® Glass DXC Touch Screen (10-point multi-touch) Refresh Rate: 120Hz Response Time: 7ms Brightness: 500nits AMD FreeSyncâ„¢ Premium (Variable Refresh Rate)

  • Memory: 16GB LPDDR5 on board (6400MT/s dual channel)

  • Storage: 512GB PCIeÂ® 4.0 NVMeâ„¢ M.2 SSD (2230)

  • I/O Ports: 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack 1x ROG XG Mobile Interface and USB Type-C combo port (with USB 3.2 Gen2, support DisplayPortâ„¢ 1.4) 1x UHS-II microSD card reader (supports SD, SDXC and SDHC)

  • Control and Input: View button Menu button L & R Hall Effect analog triggers L & R bumpers D-pad Command Center button Armoury Crate button A B X Y buttons 2 x assignable grip buttons Thumbsticks: 2 x full-size analog sticks Haptics: HD haptics Gyro: 6-Axis IMU

  • Audio: Hi-Res certification (for headphone) Dolby Atmos AI noise-canceling technology Built-in array microphone 2-speaker system with Smart Amplifier Technology

  • Network and Communication: Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Triple band) 2*2 + BluetoothÂ® 5.2 (*BluetoothÂ® version may change with OS version different.)

  • Battery: 40WHrs, 4S1P, 4-cell Li-ion

  • Power Supply: TYPE-C, 65W AC Adapter, Output: 20V DC, 3.25A, 65W, Input: 100~240V AC 50/60Hz universal

  • Aura Sync: Yes

  • Weight: 608 g (1.34 lbs)

  • Dimensions (W x D x H): 28.0 x 11.1 x 2.12 ~ 3.24 cm (11.02" x 4.37" x 0.83" ~ 1.28")

  • Security: Microsoft Pluton security processor Built-in Fingerprint Sensor
